column5: Hey All, I'm new to the board and like most of you, I'm waiting for the ice to form.  While I wait and pray for colder weather, I thought I'd share some of my favourite fishing pictures from 2006.   this bag of largemouth helped my team advance to New York this July.   biggest salmon I've ever caught, got him on a 4 egg roe bag at the Clay Banks in Bowmanville Creek.   A small club tournament that I won in September.   8th Place at the Orillia Fall Challenge   First salmon of 06.   Nice dropshot fish on Rice Lake.   17th Place on Six Mile (Bassmania Western). Not a day for big fish, but we caught over 70!   My girlfriends monster smallie from camping this summer.   My girlfriend is learning the art of bass fishing, and I love it!   Club pike tournament I won with my dad, who lives in Saskatchewan but flew in.   Monster Smallie   Big topwater smallie!   my girlfriend with a nice pike from Couchiching.   first ling, about 1:30am   lots of fish, twelve teenagers = full stomachs.  Thanks for reading and browsing.  Steve
Holy cow  ...Welcome on Steve...Great way to start out.   Beauti fish
I agree Awesome & i am sooo jealous......lol  Welcome to the forum Steve fantabulous 1st report.  Look forward to seeing more of ur reports if they are anything like this one.....
Welcome Steve.  Those are some impressive smallies there.  Great first report.  Joey
Awesome intro!  Great pics!  Look forward to seeing more of your reports.
Once again, thanks guys.   I always appreciate good photos, so I always like to share mine, lets see everyone elses favourite photos from 2006.
huge huge bass man!  THanks for sharing yoru 2006 year in review!  Cheers!
welcome steve,great pics of some hugesmallies man way to go   and congrats on the tourney wins  thanks for sharing...cheers
Welcome to the board....I think you'll fit in just fine here....  dk
yo man,   cant wait until Jan.26.....  i am pumped,   lets get off to a good start for 2007 man,       i have walleyes in my dreams now.....lol
same man, im so stoked.  what time u get off school on Thursday? I wanna head back to Barrie ASAP.
